email_content:
Hi Jacqueline,

I hope you've been doing well! I wanted to reconnect after our last conversation about your work at Pubrio ‚Äî helping clients across APAC with lead generation, data enrichment, and multilingual outreach through your SaaS platform. It was great to learn more about how your team supports businesses expanding between markets like China, Hong Kong, Singapore, and the U.S.

From our side, Remote Helpers can provide:
üí° Lead generation managers and inside sales specialists to support outbound and follow-up campaigns for your APAC clients
üåê Multilingual marketing assistants experienced with LinkedIn, Apollo, and ZoomInfo to enhance cross-market outreach
‚öôÔ∏è Flexible collaboration options ‚Äî from part-time and 4-hour-per-day support to one-off project-based staffing

If you're still exploring potential cooperation or looking to scale your delivery capacity, I'd be happy to schedule a short follow-up call to review a few suitable profiles and discuss how we can align our teams.

üìÖ Would Wednesday or Thursday at 10:30 AM your time work for you?
We can prepare a few sample profiles and updated rate information ahead of the call.

Looking forward to hearing from you,
